title: The Craghold Crypt
description: Prisoner of EvilWith her first view of the cursed Craghold House, deep in the remote hex country of Pennsylvania, an inexplicable fear shrouded Donna Duncan. She had never seen the house before but, like hte memory of a nightmare, she recognized it immedietely--and the evil that waited within. Something deep insider her told her to run while she was still able. But Donna was a sensible and intelligent girl with a job to do. And even when the Professor warned her she laughed.It wasn't until one horror-filled, moonlit night when all the ancient evil that filled the house rose to surround her that the terrified girl realized she should not have ignored the warnings. But, by then, it was too late...
author: Edwina Noone
